DataElement.preferredName: Patient HLA Class I Histocompatibility Antigen, A-2 Alpha Chain Positive Finding Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria  Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._HLA class I histocompatibility antigen, A-2 alpha chain (365 aa, ~41 kDa) is encoded by the human HLA-A gene. This protein is involved in antigen presentation._A quantity having a value greater than zero._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria._An observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism._The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient HLA Class I Histocompatibility Antigen, A-2 Alpha Chain Positive Finding Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Positive Finding
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._HLA class I histocompatibility antigen, A-2 alpha chain (365 aa, ~41 kDa) is encoded by the human HLA-A gene. This protein is involved in antigen presentation._A quantity having a value greater than zero._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria._An observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: HLA Class I Histocompatibility Antigen, A-2 Alpha Chain Positive Finding Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: HLA class I histocompatibility antigen, A-2 alpha chain (365 aa, ~41 kDa) is encoded by the human HLA-A gene. This protein is involved in antigen presentation.:An observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.longName: HLA Class I Histocompatibility Antigen, A-2 Alpha Chain
Concepts.definition: HLA class I histocompatibility antigen, A-2 alpha chain (365 aa, ~41 kDa) is encoded by the human HLA-A gene. This protein is involved in antigen presentation.
A finding of abnormality following an examination or observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk
